sect2.title: Make Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld Coreutils: basename, cat, chgrp, chmod, echo, expr, hostname, install, ls, mv, rm, sleep, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gawk: gawk GCC: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Glibc: getconf Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep M4: m4 Make: make Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
